title: Unconventional blouse trend for the festive season
text: If you’re looking to elevate your festive wardrobe this season, take inspiration from these leading ladies who have opted for some unusual and gravity-defying blouse styles. From exaggerated shoulders to some risqué cuts with décolletage detail, these statement-making pieces are all you need. Traditional blouses are constantly being reinvented with a modern twist. While Sonam Kapoor Ahuja kept it simple with a scarlet blouse, bearing an asymmetrical front opening. Sara Ali Khan opted for a sheer blouse with 3D floral applique. Want to step out of your comfort zone and experiment with your sartorial choices? Fret not, we’ve got you covered. Here’s our edit of all the styles in which you can interpret the unusual blouse trend.
description: Take cues from Sonam Kapoor Ahuja and Sara Ali Khan on how to work the unconventional blouse trend, here’s all that you need to know.
